Record.ClassificationPath: Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Ventricular Outflow Obstruction/Aortic Valve Stenosis/Aortic Stenosis, Subvalvular/Discrete Subaortic Stenosis
Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Heart Valve Diseases/Aortic Valve Stenosis/Aortic Stenosis, Subvalvular/Discrete Subaortic Stenosis
Record.Description: A type of constriction that is caused by the presence of a fibrous ring (discrete type) below the AORTIC VALVE, anywhere between the aortic valve and the MITRAL VALVE. It is characterized by restricted outflow from the LEFT VENTRICLE into the AORTA.
